title: Alter
content:
Alter is new typefamily with cyrillics. Now available on [myfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017004222/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/andrey-kudryavtsev/alter/)  
One of eight type faces is free.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017004222im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tf1_5448.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017004222im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tf2_4671.jpg)
author: fonterior
